item.title: Grantham lecture: a topical discussion with a distinguished speaker
item.author: Kenza Tazi,
item.description: Following the established tradition of his predecessors, His Serene Highness Prince Albert II came to Imperial to promote ocean conservation. The principality of Monaco is known to have led many expeditions under the leadership of Prince Albert I, the current prince’s grandfather, and Jacques-Yves …

item.title: Cassini bids farewell in its Grand Finale
item.author: Kenza Tazi,
item.description: Before 1:00 PM (GMT) today, the Cassini spacecraft will bid us a final farewell. We will take a closer look at this mission, the furthest orbiting space operation from Earth, and what we can expect in the last moments of Cassini’s life. On October 15th 1997, Cassini was launched from Cape Canaveral, …
